@Painstorm77 His nose was pretty much in the skunks butt so itâ€™s pretty isolated (the smell). he doesnâ€™t smell TOO bad (ok he still stinks but not NEAR as bad) but Iâ€™ll definitely look into the shampoo tomorrow!! Thanks so much!

Final update.. for the most part the smell is off harley. eye/nose/mouth all seem to be fine. Small smell in the house, and still quite a stench on the balcony (where he spent most of the time). ruined so many towels. glass cleaned up. Cola has just been chillin....NIGHT
